::: {.column width=65%}
This model simulates a version of Benguigui’s highly abstract model of urban growth, as discussed in

Benguigui L. 1995. A new aggregation model. Application to town growth. _Physica A: Statistical Mechanics and its Applications_ **219** 13–26.

Benguigui L. 1998. Aggregation models for town growth. _Philosophical Magazine Part B_ **77** 1269–75.
:::
::::
